p: The chemicals and reagents used in this study were hexane, ethyl acetate (EtOAc), methanol (MeOH), 70% ethanol, sodium chloride solution, McFarland standard, 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), disodium hydrogen phosphate (Na 2HPO 4), sodium dihydrogen phosphate (NaH 2PO 4), porcine pancreas alpha-amylase, NaOH, 3,5-dinitrosalicylic acid (DNS), sodium potassium tartrate, and distilled water.
